pack";"

Shipments and returns

Your pack shipment

Packages are generally dispatched within 2 days after receipt of payment and are shipped via UPS with tracking and drop-off without signature. If you prefer delivery by UPS Extra with required signature
column6: an additional cost will be applied
column7: so please contact us before choosing this method. Whichever shipment choice you make
column8:
we will provide you with a link to track your package online.

Shipping fees include handling and packing fees as well as postage costs. Handling fees are fixed
column9: whereas transport fees vary according to total weight of the shipment. We advise you to group your items in one order. We cannot group two distinct orders placed separately
column10: and shipping fees will apply to each of them. Your package will be dispatched at your own risk
column11:
but special care is taken to protect fragile objects.

Boxes are amply sized and your items are well-protected.

column1: 1. Position section of the modules list.

After activating all necessary modules you need to assign them to correct positions. In PrestaShop admin panel from the top menu select Modules > Positions. To place module in the required position just drag it to the position section of the modules list.
